item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: I am starting my blog. Finally! I have thought about it for a long time, and I am not really sure what was stopping me from doing it. But here I am with my blog! I developed this blog using Hugo, a wonderful and very flexible framework for building websites. It is open-source and it generates static websites. Well, static does not mean that nothing will change here. Quite on the contrary, I plan to put different stuff in here:
